'''Genshin Impact x Pizza Alvolo''' is a collaborative effort between [[Genshin Impact]] creators [[miHoYo]] and the South Korean pizza restaurant Pizza Alvolo.

==Event Details==
This collaboration features various Pizza Alvolo items, with a custom theme centred around [[Jean]] and [[Barbara]].<ref>Korean Event Website: [https://act.hoyoverse.com/puzzle/hk4e/pz_ghyEoqaAFP/index.html?game_biz=hk4e_global Official Announcement]</ref>

Other physical merchandise includes:
* Pizza Alvolo styled Jean/Barbara pizza boxes
* Pizza Alvolo styled Jean/Barbara acrylic character stands
* Pizza Alvolo styled Jean/Barbara table mats
* Pizza Alvolo styled Jean/Barbara tumbler
* Pizza Alvolo styled Jean/Barbara keychains

Certain menu items came with redemption codes for special in-game benefits, which include:
* {{Item|Wings of the Starlit Feast}}
* {{Item|Million Flavors Savored|x=1}}
* {{Item|Super Magnificent Pizza|x=2}}
* {{Item|Minty Fruit Tea|x=2}}
* {{Item|Mora|x=50,000}}
